column2: rosemary l. (nee hegener) wife of the late dominic m. giordano
column12: devoted sister of al (carol) hegener and clare (jim) keller
column13: also survived by nieces and nephews. june 11
column14: 2015. age 80 years. residence anderson twp. mass of christian burial at guardian angels church mt. washington on wed. june 17
column15: at 10:30 am. friends may visit at the church on wed. from 9:30-10:30 am. memorials to guardian angels church. t p white & sons funeral home serving the family.
